Html:
Hi,

I am implementing WPF desktop application using MVVM pattern and Prism v4 library.

Is there some guidance and best practices on how to  Drag & Drop objects between Views in proper way?

Samples would be of great help also.

Thanks.

Hi,

You might find the following threads useful to your scenario:

  • Drag and Drop with MVVM
  • MVVM with Drag & Drop
  • Drag & Drop and modifying Width via mouse while using MVVM - Databinding

I hope you find this helpful.

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
